meanings.definition: Insufficient nourishment resulting from inadequate food intake or poor absorption of nutrients.
meanings.sent1: Severe undernutrition can lead to serious health problems.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with undernutrition due to lack of proper food.
meanings.sent3: The undernutrition in the fridge was so bad that even the vegetables were sad.
meanings.sent4: Her undernutrition was like a barren field, devoid of any sustenance.
meanings.sent5: The undernutrition in the village was a silent enemy, slowly weakening the community.

meanings.definition: The condition of not getting enough nutrients to maintain good health and well-being.
meanings.sent1: Undernutrition can affect a person's ability to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Children in poverty often suffer from undernutrition.
meanings.sent3: The undernutrition at the party was evident by the lack of nutritious snacks.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of abundance, undernutrition is a stark reminder of inequality.
meanings.sent5: The undernutrition of the soil resulted in stunted crops and hungry farmers.
